pageContext.claim: “And the fake news media, 94% of the stories about us are negative. Think of it. Think of it. 64% of the stories about Sleepy Joe are positive.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing a study a conservative site, MRC Newsbusters, which uses a dubious methodology and only focuses on the "Big Three" evening broadcasts, not cable news, newspapers or fawning Trump-friendly broadcasters.
